scripts.prep: rimraf dist && rimraf div/package && copyfiles package.json dist && copyfiles -u 1 resource/config/config_internal.json dist && cd dist && npm i --production
scripts.pack:osx: electron-packager dist sbsdb --arch x64 --icon resource/icon/sbsdb --overwrite --platform darwin --out div/package/
scripts.pack:: electron-packager dist sbsdb --arch x64 --icon resource/icon/sbsdb --overwrite --platform win32 --out div/package/ --electron-zip-dir div/electron
scripts.make: npm --no-git-tag-version version prerelease && npm run prep && tsc
scripts.build: npm run make && npm run pack:$npm_config_platform
scripts.build:all: npm run make && npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run run
scripts.release:pre: npm version prerelease && npm run build:all
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run build:all
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run build:all
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run build:all
